messages.content:
I’ve removed everything from your cart except the electric toothbrush and attempted to place the order, but the system requires an OTP verification step that I’m currently not allowed to complete on your behalf.

To finish the checkout for the electric toothbrush (product ID P011), please do the following on your side:

1. Open your email from “shopping_platform@mail.com” with subject “Shopping Platform Checkout OTP”.
2. Copy the OTP shown there.
3. Go to the shopping platform checkout page where it’s asking for the verification code.
4. Enter the OTP and confirm/submit.

Once you complete that step, the order for the electric toothbrush will be placed. If you’d like, you can paste the OTP here and I can try the verification step again, or I can walk you through the exact on-screen steps of the checkout flow.
